alert.note: Alert for Hernando; Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 10:08AM EST until December 15 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Pasco County in west central Florida... Southwestern Hernando County in west central Florida... * Until 1045 AM EST. * At 1008 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Weeki Wachee Gardens to 6 miles west of Jasmine Estates, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, New Port Richey, Weeki Wachee, High Point, Jasmine Estates, Weeki Wachee Gardens, New Port Richey East, Shady Hills, Hudson and Moon Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for west central Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for west central Florida.
